post:
Greetings all! Geek Solutions is proud to announce a new lineup of Ryzen 7 3700 Pro Series KVM machines.

Hypervisor Specifications:

```
Ryzen 7 3700 PRO Series Processor
64 GB DDR4
4x4TB HDD RAID10
Canada Location
```

Diving into the offer:

```
30 GB Storage
1 GB Memory
1 Core
Fair Share CPU Usage
25 TB on 10 Gbps
$7.00/month
```

**Get a free bump to 2 GB Memory by opening a ticket and referencing this offer post!**

We only have **4** of these packages in stock right now, so get them while they’re still here!

**Special:** All active Ryzen KVM customers are entitled to **free** Shared Hosting (2GB) in New York! Open a ticket to claim yours upon purchase of Ryzen KVM!

Order Link:

https://console.geeksolutions.ca/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=36

### Notice

Orders are processed within standard business hours, which are considered 7 AM to 6 PM Eastern Time (Billing and Order Management). If you order outside of these times, your order will be processed on the **next business day**.

**Please ensure your information on file matches the information on your payment method (PayPal, Credit/Debit), otherwise, you will be subjected to additional anti-fraud screening.**
